mapper.select: SELECT m.id, idx, grade, telephone1, address, detailaddress, acaname, telephone2, telephone3, a.id,introduce, category, acaIntroPhoto FROM members m inner join AcaIntroduce a on m.id=a.id WHERE m.idx=${Idx}
UPDATE members SET address = ?, detailaddress = ?, acaname = ?, telephone2 = ?, telephone3 =? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE acaintroduce SET introduce=?, category=?, acaintrophoto=? where id = ?
SELECT m.id, teaimage, teaname, teaintro, subject, teaidx, a.id FROM members m inner join AcaTeacher a on m.id = a.id WHERE teaidx = ${TeaIdx}
